title: Loftus study auto accident influence on recall

content.question: In studies of memory reconstruction in which students viewed films of an automobile accident, the major influence on recall was which of the following?

choices.label: Number of pictures the students were shown of the accident
Length of time the students viewed pictures of the accident
Wording of questions the students were asked about the accident

content.answer: Wording of questions the students were asked about the accident

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
